name: Neon Nights (NickGamesDev)
description:
Description

Neon Nights is a fast paced bullet hell style game. The key is to be light on your toes to out maneuverer the enemies! Progress through rounds & rooms to see how far you can go! With different weapons, you can choose which is best for your environment, so run around with the super quick firing laser, or slow down behind cover with the powerful cannon! But be careful, enemies with different weapons types can always ruin your day!

Neon lights is a 3D action First Person Shooter Game. As a Bullet hell, the game is fast paced. The aim of the game is to survive the longest and complete rounds. The game uses Cubes to create a pixel theme and neon because... well neon's awesome!

Neon Nights is a 3D Game, built using Unity. Neon Nights was created by Roll Initiative, comprised of 3 people, Nick, Zack & Mat. The Purpose of this game being created is for COMP3013 module at University. 

Features
  • Procedurally generated terrain, so no round is like the last!
  • With 3 different enemy types, strategies and technique may come in handy!
  • Collect health packs when you get low to keep going!
  • Replay to try and beat your high scores!
Controls
  •  W A S D   >>>  Move Forward, Left, Backwards & Right
  • Mouse Movement >>> Aim
  • "Left Click"  >>> Shoot
  • 1, 2, 3 or "Scroll Wheel"  >>> Change Weapons
  • ESC  >>> Pause Game
Download

Download for Windows

  • Unzip File.
  • Open "Neon Nights" Folder
  • Run "Neon Nights.exe".
  • Enjoy Killing Everything!
